original_title: Rosamunde Pilcher: Shades of Love-A Healing Heart
overview: In a flashback, Laura Aird is seen withdrawing totally from society after tragedy strikes. Hamish Balmerino is concerned about her state of mind, and the forthcoming ball does nothing to improve matters, so her father decides to make her sister Alexa's husband the head of the family business.
title: Rosamunde Pilcher: Shades of Love-A Healing Heart
